name: Monk D
description:
Controls

Move with WASD or keyboard arrows. Shoot with left mouse button.

Credits

Andrey Panchenko — programming

Tatyana Myshlyavkina — art

Valeriya De-Ladvez — level design

Nikolay Malishew — game design

Ernest Arifulov — music

Description

Meet Monk D — a Japanese monk, who travels around the world and fights ancient demons. But each fight is a challenge. Will he dive deeper and deeper into the world of madness? Or will he save himself, his spirit and the world? The choice is yours, if you dare to step into this deep spiritual adventure. 

Free sounds used

https://freesound.org/people/LiamG_SFX/sounds/334234/

https://freesound.org/people/HerraBilbo/sounds/360686/
